product_name: MSR Lightning Modular Snowshoe Flotation Tails - 5"
long_description: Lightning Modular Flotation Tails add 5 in. of length to your MSR Lightning snowshoes for greater flotation when you're hiking through deep snow or carrying a heavy backpack.
short_description: Lightning Modular Flotation Tails add 5 in. of length to your MSR Lightning snowshoes for greater flotation when you're hiking through deep snow or carrying a heavy backpack.
